p: In vitro supplementation of oregano essential oil ( Origanum vulgare) has shown a significant stimulating effect on advanced mobility parameters curvilinear velocity (VCL) ( P < 0.01) ( Figure 4), linear velocity (VSL) ( P < 0.01) ( Figure 5), mean path velocity (VAP) ( P < 0.01) ( Figure 6), and amplitude of displacement (ALH) ( P < 0.01) ( Figure 7).
